title: Calories in a Slice of Ham
meta_description: Discover calories in a slice ham, including protein, fat, sodium details, per-slice nutrition, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Slice of Ham
assumptions: Deli-sliced cooked ham, ~28 g per thin slice, cured with minimal additives, no breading or glaze.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, thickness, curing method, and slice size. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A slice of ham provides ~46 kcal, 5 g protein, and is low in carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Glazed with honey (add 1 tsp per slice)

faqs.q: How many calories in a slice of ham?
faqs.a: About 46 kcal for a standard 28 g deli slice.
